Manage Cookies
We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. If you continue to use this site, please accept the use of cookies.
Reject AllSettingsAccept All
Manage consent

Privacy Overview

This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience.
Necessary
Toujours activé
Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously.
CookieDuréeDescription
actual-order30 minutesThis cookie stores the filter type of the service section when the user clicks to see the Service Details. Thus when he wants to go back to the main page, the exact type of filter is displayed to him.
actual-order-by30 minutesThis cookie stores the filter order of the service section when the user clicks to see the Service Details. Thus when he wants to go back to the main page, the exact filter order is displayed to him.
actual-page30 minutes[Google] This cookie stores the page number of the service section when user clicks to see the Service Details. Thus when he wants to go back to the main page, the exact page is displayed to him. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
consentExpiration12 monthsThis cookie store the date of the consent when the user has done the consent.
cookielawinfo-checkbox-advertisementsessionSet by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin, this cookie is used to record the user consent for the cookies in the "Advertisement" category .
cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics11 monthsThis cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics".
cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional11 monthsThe cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional".
cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary11 monthsThis cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary".
cookielawinfo-checkbox-others11 monthsThis cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other.
cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance11 monthsThis cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance".
CookieLawInfoConsent11 monthsThe cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.
viewed_cookie_policy11 monthsThe cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data.
Functional
Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features.
CookieDuréeDescription
SEARCH_SAMESITE6 months[Google] This cookie is used to prevent Google Cookies from being used across multiple sites. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
Performance
Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors.
Analytics
Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.
CookieDuréeDescription
AECSession[Google] Allows user traffic to be analyzed by generating an anonymous user ID that is used to measure how many times a user visits the Site. Likewise, it records when was the first and last time you visited the Web, when a session was terminated and the origin of the user. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
DV2 years[Google] These cookies are used to collect information about how visitors use the Site and use the information to compile reports and to help improve the Site. The cookies collect information in an anonymous form, including the number of visitors to the Site, where visitors have come to the Site from and the pages they visited. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
HSID2 years[Google] uses these cookies based on recent searches, in order to improve its advertising service on its sites. These cookies collect statistical information on the number and behavior of users visiting the site and their preferences. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
NID2 years[Google] uses these cookies based on recent searches, in order to improve its advertising service on its sites. These cookies collect statistical information on the number and behavior of users visiting the site and their preferences. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
OTZ2 years[Google] uses these cookies based on recent searches, in order to improve its advertising service on its sites. These cookies collect statistical information on the number and behavior of users visiting the site and their preferences. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
SID2 years[Google] This cookie confirms visitor authenticity, prevent illegal use of login data and protect visitor data from unauthorized access. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
SSID2 years[Google] uses these cookies based on recent searches, in order to improve its advertising service on its sites. These cookies collect statistical information on the number and behavior of users visiting the site and their preferences. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
Advertisement
Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads.
CookieDuréeDescription
__Secure-1PAPISID2 years[Google] This cookie stores information of the visitors interest to show relevant and personalized ads through retargeting. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
__Secure-1PSID2 years[Google] This cookie stores information of the visitors interest to show relevant and personalized ads through retargeting. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en

__Secure-ENID2 years[Google] This cookie allows you to customize how ads are seen outside of Google or store information like your preferred language. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
APISID12 months[Google] This cookie is used to improve your user experience when you are logged in Google and allows you to stay connected to your Google Account. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
CONSENT13 months[Google] This cookie is used to save your cookie choices and remains active for 13 months. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
SAPISID12 months[Google] This cookie is used to improve your user experience when you are logged in Google and allows you to stay connected to your Google Account. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
SIDCC3 months[Google] This cookie gives information on how the user uses the website and on the advertising he may have seen before visiting the site. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
SOCS13 months[Google] This cookie is used to save your cookie choices and remains active for 13 months. See the Google Policy : https://policies.google.com/technologies/cookies?hl=en
Others
Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet.
